testsuite.name: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: When I navigate to the "Grade Reports" in "Gradebook" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: And I click the new snapshot button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: And I click the "Add Group" button in the snapshot editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: And I set the "Group Name" textbox input to "Test GR Weight"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: And I set the "Weight" textbox input to "99"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: And I check assignment "Student Readiness Test"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: Then I click the save group button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: When I set the snapshot name to "Test GR Weight"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: And I set the visibility checkbox of the snapshot to checked
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: And I click the "Save" button in the snapshot editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: Then I see the following error message displayed "Total weight must equal 100%"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot total weight must be 100%

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Ensure that a snapshot is given a name ?[90m# snapshot/SnapshotEditor.feature:8?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI navigate to the "?[0m?[32m?[1mGrade Reports?[0m?[32m" in "?[0m?[32m?[1mGradebook?[0m?[32m" of current class?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.navigateInClass(String,String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click the new snapshot button?[0m ?[90m# SnapshotHomepageSteps.clickNewButton()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click the "?[0m?[32m?[1mSave?[0m?[32m" button in the snapshot editor?[0m ?[90m# SnapshotEditorSteps.clickButton(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see an alert open indicating a name must be entered?[0m ?[90m# SnapshotEditorSteps.assertAlertOpen()?[0m
